com.facebook.react.modules.fresco

类 FrescoModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.bridge.BaseJavaModule
      • com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactContextBaseJavaModule
        • com.facebook.react.modules.fresco.FrescoModule
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    LifecycleEventListener, NativeModule, ModuleDataCleaner.Cleanable

    public class FrescoModule
extends ReactContextBaseJavaModule
implements ModuleDataCleaner.Cleanable, LifecycleEventListener
    Module to initialize the Fresco library.

    Does not expose any methods to JavaScript code. For initialization and cleanup only.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FrescoModule

        public FrescoModule(ReactApplicationContext reactContext)
        Create a new Fresco module with a default configuration (or the previously given configuration via FrescoModule(ReactApplicationContext, boolean, ImagePipelineConfig).
        参数:
        reactContext - the context to use

      • FrescoModule

        public FrescoModule(ReactApplicationContext reactContext,
                    boolean clearOnDestroy)
        Create a new Fresco module with a default configuration (or the previously given configuration via FrescoModule(ReactApplicationContext, boolean, ImagePipelineConfig).
        参数:
        clearOnDestroy - whether to clear the memory cache in onHostDestroy: this should be true for pure RN apps and false for apps that use Fresco outside of RN as well
        reactContext - the context to use

      • FrescoModule

        public FrescoModule(ReactApplicationContext reactContext,
                    boolean clearOnDestroy,
                    ImagePipelineConfig config)
        Create a new Fresco module with a given ImagePipelineConfig. This should only be called when the module has not been initialized yet. You can use hasBeenInitialized() to check this and call FrescoModule(ReactApplicationContext) if it is already initialized. Otherwise, the given Fresco configuration will be ignored.
        参数:
        reactContext - the context to use
        clearOnDestroy - whether to clear the memory cache in onHostDestroy: this should be true for pure RN apps and false for apps that use Fresco outside of RN as well
        config - the Fresco configuration, which will only be used for the first initialization

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        从接口复制的说明: NativeModule
        This is called at the end of CatalystApplicationFragment#createCatalystInstance() after the CatalystInstance has been created, in order to initialize NativeModules that require the CatalystInstance or JS modules.
        指定者:
        initialize 在接口中 NativeModule
        覆盖:
        initialize 在类中 BaseJavaModule

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        指定者:
        getName 在接口中 NativeModule
        返回:
        the name of this module. This will be the name used to require() this module from javascript.

      • clearSensitiveData

        public void clearSensitiveData()
        指定者:
        clearSensitiveData 在接口中 ModuleDataCleaner.Cleanable

      • hasBeenInitialized

        public static boolean hasBeenInitialized()
        Check whether the FrescoModule has already been initialized. If this is the case, Calls to #FrescoModule(ReactApplicationContext, ImagePipelineConfig) will ignore the given configuration.
        返回:
        true if this module has already been initialized

      • getDefaultConfigBuilder

        public static ImagePipelineConfig.Builder getDefaultConfigBuilder(ReactContext context)
        Get the default Fresco configuration builder. Allows adding of configuration options in addition to the default values.
        返回:
        ImagePipelineConfig.Builder that has been initialized with default values

      • onHostResume

        public void onHostResume()
        从接口复制的说明: LifecycleEventListener
        Called either when the host activity receives a resume event (e.g. Activity#onResume or if the native module that implements this is initialized while the host activity is already resumed. Always called for the most current activity.
        指定者:
        onHostResume 在接口中 LifecycleEventListener

      • onHostPause

        public void onHostPause()
        从接口复制的说明: LifecycleEventListener
        Called when host activity receives pause event (e.g. Activity#onPause. Always called for the most current activity.
        指定者:
        onHostPause 在接口中 LifecycleEventListener

      • onHostDestroy

        public void onHostDestroy()
        从接口复制的说明: LifecycleEventListener
        Called when host activity receives destroy event (e.g. Activity#onDestroy. Only called for the last React activity to be destroyed.
        指定者:
        onHostDestroy 在接口中 LifecycleEventListener
